channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ University of Iowa on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Contextual Multinomial Logit Bandits with General Value Functions
item.description: Contextual MNL bandits are revolutionized with general value functions, offering enhanced algorithms for stochastic and adversarial settings, surpassing previous results in accuracy and efficiency.

item.title: No-Regret Learning for Fair Multi-Agent Social Welfare Optimization
item.description: This paper solves the open problem of achieving no-regret learning in online multi-agent Nash social welfare maximization.
